thread.title: US President Barack Obama farewell speech in Chicago
thread.title_full: US President Barack Obama farewell speech in Chicago

title: US President Barack Obama farewell speech in Chicago
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device US President Barack Obama farewell speech in Chicago 11 January 2017 Last updated at 07:27 GMT 
President Barack Obama outlined his achievements in his farewell speech in Chicago. 
The country's first black president, now 55, was first elected in 2008 on a message of hope and change. 
His successor, Donald Trump, has vowed to undo some of Mr Obama's signature policies after he is sworn into office on 20 January. Related Topics
